name: Battle-Maggots
description:
The worst version of worms there is.

p.s. sound works better in desktop version

Controls:

A,D - move left,right

W,S - aiming

E - jump

C- skip turn

SPACE - shooting

N - mute sound effects

M - stop music

Credits

Sprites: poprikopo, samu_gO5tz

Sound effects: samu_gO5tz

Music: jkvastad

Bugs: homyakokryak

Design: homyakokryak, GummiGamer
